Text.Page:
I am vexed by this creature, Nakarash. I can't deduce why he's so hard to kill. To their credit, the soldiers did their best, but he cut them down like so much chaff.

I won't lie to you, this will be a difficult battle. If you can kill {@LinkCreature:7#18#Nakarash}, we'll be one step closer to finishing our research. Then, perhaps, we can turn our attention to retaking this region for the federation.

You slew Nakarash? And you brought me a scale to study? I'm beginning to think your talents are wasted here in the field. You should be at the Legion of Arms training our finest soldiers!

Thanks to you, my insanely intrepid companion and I can finish our research and return to the sanctuary of Allemantheia. Gratitude, .
I dare not continue my studies as long as Nakarash is stomping around the hills. I urge you to end his life and thus preserve ours.

A piece of Nakarash's armor? Intriguing. You must be skilled indeed to take down a beast such as he.

We will study this carefully and add its strength to our own. You have our gratitude.
